item.title: Bobby Hebb - Sunny - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Sunny by Bobby Hebb from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A7, A♯maj7, Dm, Dm6, Dm7, Dmadd5, D♯9, Em7, Esus4, F9.

item.title: Charlie Chaplin - Smile - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Smile by Charlie Chaplin from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: Am7, A♯7, C, C6, Cmaj7, Ddim, Dm, Dm7, D♯dim, Edim7, Fm, Fm6, G7.

item.title: Charlie Chaplin - Smile - Ukulele Cheats

item.title: Louis Armstrong - What A Wonderful World - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song What A Wonderful World by Louis Armstrong from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, A♯, A♯maj7, C7, Cdim7, C♯, Dm, D♯, F, Faug, Fmaj7, Gm7.

item.title: George Gershwin - Summertime - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Summertime by George Gershwin from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: Am, Am9, C, Dm, E7, F.

item.title: Patsy Cline - Crazy - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Crazy by Patsy Cline from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: A7, C, C7, Cmaj7, C♯dim7, D7, D7♭9, Dm, Em7, F, G7, G7+5.

item.title: Stars Fell on Alabama // Cynthia Lin Jazz Ukulele - Cynthia Lin Music
George Gershwin - Summertime - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Summertime by George Gershwin from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: Am, Am9, B7♭9, C, D7, Dm7, E7, E♭dim7.
